StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_gen_waivers179]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as SET ARITHABORT OFF set arithignore on set ansi_warnings o.
declare @ssn varchar(9), @person_id int, @nwa_id int, @waiver_id int, @waiver_status_code char(1), @approval int, @occasion_id int, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me, @wvr1 char(1), @wvr2 char(2), @wvr3 char(3), @mos_qual varchar(4), @program_wvr varchar(4), @delayed_wvr char(1), @con_moral_cd varchar(3), @cont_wvr1 varchar(3), @cont_wvr2 varchar(3), @cont_wvr3 varchar(3), @sd_moral_cd varchar(3), @sd_wvr1 varchar(3), @sd_wvr2 varchar(3), @sd_wvr3 varchar(3), @rd_moral_cd varchar(3), @rd_wvr1 varchar(3), @rd_wvr2 varchar(3), @rd_wvr3 varchar(3), @contract_date date.me, @ship_date date.me , @rd_date date.me , @moral_cd varchar(3), @dep_ext int
-- se.ng up the global variables
set @update_date = getdate() set @user_login = 'migra.on' set @waiver_status_code = 'A'
--crea.ng lookup table
create table temp_waiver ( WAIVER_ID int, WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE char(1), WAIVER_TYPE_CODE char(1), WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE char(1), )
insert temp_waiver select w.waiver_id, c.WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, t.WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, l.WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE from waiver w, waiver_category c, waiver_type t, waiver_level l where w.waiver_category_id = c.waiver_category_id and w.waiver_type_id = t.waiver_type_id and w. waiver_level_id = l.waiver_level_id
--indexing temp_waiver
create index idx_temp_waiver on temp_waiver(WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE, WAIVER_TYPE_CODE, WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE)
-- declaring the cursor
declare waiver cursor for select MOS_QUALIFICATION_WAIVER, PROGRAM_ENLISTED_FOR_WAIVER,DELAYED_ENTRY_PROGRAM_WAIVER, CONT_MORAL_WVR,CONT_WVR1, CONT_WVR2, CONT_WVR3,SD_MORAL_WVR, SD_WVR1, SD_WVR2, SD_WVR3, RD_MORAL_WVR, RD_WVR1, RD_WVR2, RD_WVR3, SSN,dateadd(day,-1,DEP_DATEIN), convert(date.me,CADB,112), dateadd(day, 1, convert(date.me,CADB,112)) from arms..ARMS179 where MOS_QUALIFICATION_WAIVER not like '' or PROGRAM_ENLISTED_FOR_WAIVER not like '' or DELAYED_ENTRY_PROGRAM_WAIVER != 'N' or CONT_MORAL_WVR != 'YY' or CONT_WVR1 != 'YYY' or CONT_WVR2 != 'YYY' or CONT_WVR3 != 'YYY' or SD_MORAL_WVR != 'YY' or SD_WVR1 != 'YYY' or SD_WVR2 != 'YYY' or SD_WVR3 != 'YYY' or RD_MORAL_WVR not like '' or RD_WVR1 != 'YYY' or RD_WVR2 != 'YYY' or RD_WVR3 != 'YYY' open waiver
fetch waiver into @mos_qual, @program_wvr, @delayed_wvr, @con_moral_cd,@cont_wvr1,@cont_wvr2,@cont_wvr3,@sd_moral_cd, @sd_wvr1, @sd_wvr2, @sd_wvr3, @rd_moral_cd, @rd_wvr1, @rd_wvr2, @rd_wvr3, @ssn, @contract_date,@ship_date, @rd_date
while (@@fetch_status = 0) begin set @nwa_id = (select max(nwa_id) from nwa where marine_candidate_id = (select person_id from person where social_security_number = @ssn))
-- if it is, a record is inserted into the CANDIDATE_WAIVER table
if @nwa_id is not null begin -- DEP Extension Waiver
if @delayed_wvr not in ('N','') and @delayed_wvr is not null begin if exists (select 1 from contract where nwa_id = @nwa_id) begin set @dep_ext = 0 if @delayed_wvr in ('Y','A') set @dep_ext = 30 if @delayed_wvr = 'B' set @dep_ext = 60 if @delayed_wvr = 'C' set @dep_ext = 90 if @delayed_wvr = 'D' set @dep_ext = 120 if @delayed_wvr = 'E' set @dep_ext = 150 if @delayed_wvr = 'F' set @dep_ext = 180
update CONTRACT set DEP_EXTENSION = @dep_ext, user_login = @user_login, update_date = @update_date where NWA_ID = @nwa_id
end
end
-- MOS_QUALIFICATION if there is data, auto populate per requirements if @mos_qual not in ('',' ') and @contract_date is not null begin set @occasion_id = 1 set @waiver_id = (select waiver_id from temp_waiver where WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE = 'X' and WAIVER_TYPE_CODE = 'Y' and WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE = 'B')
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id, @waiver_id, @waiver_status_code, @contract_date, @contract_date, @occasion_id, @user_login, @update_date end
--PROGRAM WAIVER if there is data, auto populate per requirements if @program_wvr not in ('',' ') and @contract_date is not null begin set @occasion_id = 1 set @waiver_id = (select waiver_id from temp_waiver where WAIVER_CATEGORY_CODE = 'X' and WAIVER_TYPE_CODE = 'Y' and WAIVER_LEVEL_CODE = 'B')
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id, @waiver_id, @waiver_status_code, @contract_date, @contract_date, @occasion_id, @user_login, @update_date end
--Contract Moral Code Logic
if @con_moral_cd not in ('CC','YY','') and @contract_date is not null begin
if substring(@con_moral_cd,1,1) in ('H','G',' P') begin set @moral_cd = 'F' + substring(@con_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@con_moral_cd,2,1) end else begin set @moral_cd = 'D' + substring(@con_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@con_moral_cd,2,1) end
execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @moral_cd, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 1 execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id, @waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@contract_date, @contract_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date end end
--Ship Moral Code Logic
if @sd_moral_cd not in ('CC','YY','') and @ship_date is not null begin if substring(@sd_moral_cd,1,1) in ('H','G',' P') and @sd_moral_cd not in (' ','') begin set @moral_cd = 'F' + substring(@sd_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@sd_moral_cd,2,1) end else begin set @moral_cd = 'D' + substring(@sd_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@sd_moral_cd,2,1) end
execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @moral_cd, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 2 execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id, @waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@ship_date, @ship_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date end end
-- RD Moral Code Logic if @rd_moral_cd not in ('CC','YY','') and @rd_date is not null begin if substring(@rd_moral_cd,1,1) in ('H','G',' P') and @rd_moral_cd not in (' ','') begin set @moral_cd = 'F' + substring(@rd_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@rd_moral_cd,2,1) end else begin set @moral_cd = 'D' + substring(@rd_moral_cd,1,1) + substring(@rd_moral_cd,2,1) end
execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @moral_cd, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 3 execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id, @waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@rd_date, @rd_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date end end
--Regular 123 Waiver Logic
if @cont_wvr1 not in (' ','','YYY') and @contract_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @cont_wvr1, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 1
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@contract_date, @contract_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end if @cont_wvr2 not in (' ','','YYY') and @contract_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @cont_wvr2, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 1
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@contract_date, @contract_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end if @cont_wvr3 not in (' ','','YYY') and @contract_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @cont_wvr3, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 1
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@contract_date, @contract_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end if @sd_wvr1 not in (' ','','YYY') and @ship_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @SD_wvr1, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 2
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@ship_date, @ship_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
if @SD_wvr2 not in (' ','','YYY') and @ship_date is not null begin set @occasion_id = 1
execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @SD_wvr2, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 2
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@ship_date, @ship_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
if @SD_wvr3 not in (' ','','YYY') and @ship_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @SD_wvr3, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 2
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@ship_date, @ship_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
if @RD_wvr1 not in (' ','','YYY') and @rd_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @rd_wvr1, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 3
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@rd_date, @rd_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
if @RD_wvr2 not in (' ','','YYY') and @rd_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @rd_wvr2, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 3
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@rd_date, @rd_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
if @RD_wvr3 not in (' ','','YYY') and @rd_date is not null begin execute sp_ManipulateWaiver @rd_wvr3, @waiver_id output
if @waiver_id != 9999 begin set @occasion_id = 3
execute sp_InsertWaiver179 @nwa_id,@waiver_id, @waiver_status_code,@rd_date, @rd_date,@occasion_id,@user_login,@update_date
end end
end fetch waiver into @mos_qual, @program_wvr, @delayed_wvr, @con_moral_cd,@cont_wvr1,@cont_wvr2,@cont_wvr3,@sd_moral_cd, @sd_wvr1, @sd_wvr2, @sd_wvr3, @rd_moral_cd, @rd_wvr1, @rd_wvr2, @rd_wvr3, @ssn, @contract_date,@ship_date, @rd_date
end
close waiver deallocate waiver
drop table temp_waiver
